Articles.Content: I see people do it all the time, but I just can't seem to do it, no matter what... Any help?
Looking at the part.cfg, it looks like srfAttach (the second entry in attachRules) is 0 for Oscars. Try cubic struts.

Yep the secret is cubic struts. Place the little cube where you want the Oscar B, place the Oscar B on the cube then pick up the little tank again and set it on the cube on the other green node that's rite on the surface of whatever the cube is attached to.
